term.title: ceramic filter

item.text: A component of a stack sampling system which is suitable for high temperature use; also known as a ceramic thimble.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2178 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
